title: Do we have to make the intention everyday before fasting in Ramadan? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Shakeel says do you have to have intention for fast every day of Ramadan no your intention is the first day of Ramadan if you have you're intending to fast tomorrow which is the first day of Ramadan the rest of the days are done automatically even if you don't wake up for sahur it's automatically done unless you interrupt Ramadan by traveling or falling sick so you break a day or two once you want to resume you have to make a new intention
